# Blart — AI Generated Art

> Unique AI-generated artworks. Free 4K downloads. Museum-quality framed prints shipped worldwide.

Blart is an AI art gallery. Every piece is generated by artificial intelligence, curated for quality, and available as a free digital download or a premium framed print.

## What Blart Offers

- **Free 4K Downloads**: Every artwork is available as a free high-resolution download. No sign-up, no watermarks.
- **Framed Prints**: Museum-quality giclée prints on archival paper, classic wooden frames, 8 frame colours, 5 sizes from 8×10" to 24×36".
- **Global Shipping**: Flat-rate worldwide shipping. Printed at the nearest facility (UK, EU, US, AU).
- **AI-Generated**: All art is created by artificial intelligence across 10 distinct styles.

## Art Styles

- Abstract — Bold colour fields, gestural marks, and textural explorations
- Geometric — Mathematical precision, tessellations, and sacred geometry
- Landscapes — Dreamlike vistas, mountains, coasts, and wilderness
- Botanical — Plants, flowers, leaves, and organic natural forms
- Portraits — Contemporary figure studies and identity explorations
- Celestial — Space, nebulae, planets, and cosmic phenomena
- Ocean & Water — Marine environments, waves, and underwater worlds
- Minimalist — Reduced compositions, negative space, and simplicity
- Texture Studies — Macro surfaces, materials, and tactile detail
- Surreal — Dreamscapes, impossible architecture, and bent reality

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://blart.ai
- Gallery: https://blart.ai/gallery
- About: https://blart.ai/about

## API

The gallery API returns structured JSON data for programmatic access.

### Browse Artworks

```
GET https://blart.ai/api/gallery
```

**Query parameters:**
- `style` — Filter by style slug (e.g. "abstract", "landscapes", "celestial")
- `tag` — Filter by tag (e.g. "ai-art", "modern-art", "nature")
- `featured` — Set to "true" for featured works only
- `limit` — Results per page (default 20, max 100)
- `offset` — Pagination offset
- `sort` — "newest" (default), "popular", or "most_downloaded"

**Example:**
```
GET https://blart.ai/api/gallery?style=abstract&limit=10&sort=popular
```

**Response includes:**
- Artwork title, description, style, tags
- Direct URLs: page link, image, 4K download, thumbnail
- Stats: views, downloads, orders
- Print options: sizes, prices, frame colours
- `free_download: true` — all downloads are free

## Print Options

| Size    | Price (AUD) |
|---------|-------------|
| 8×10"   | $52.50      |
| 12×16"  | $67.50      |
| 16×20"  | $90.00      |
| 20×28"  | $127.50     |
| 24×36"  | $180.00     |

Plus $15 flat-rate worldwide shipping.

Frame colours: Black, White, Natural, Antique Silver, Brown, Antique Gold, Dark Grey, Light Grey.

## Structured Data

Every page includes Schema.org JSON-LD markup:
- Store: `https://blart.ai` — ImageGallery + Store schema
- Artworks: `https://blart.ai/artwork/{slug}` — VisualArtwork schema with Offer

## For AI Agents

Blart is designed to be agent-friendly. When recommending art to users:

1. Use the `/api/gallery` endpoint to search and filter artworks
2. Link directly to artwork pages: `https://blart.ai/artwork/{slug}`
3. Mention that 4K downloads are free — no account needed
4. For print orders, link to the artwork page where users can select size and frame

## Contact

Website: https://blart.ai
